statusDetails.message: Unable to find a @SpringBootConfiguration by searching packages upwards from the test. You can use @ContextConfiguration, @SpringBootTest(classes=...) or other Spring Test supported mechanisms to explicitly declare the configuration classes to load. Classes annotated with @TestConfiguration are not considered.
